thread.title: AMC Technology Announces Sponsorship at Dreamforce 2015
thread.title_full: AMC Technology Announces Sponsorship at Dreamforce 2015

author: Mariah Mays
title: AMC Technology Announces Sponsorship at Dreamforce 2015
text:
Richmond, Va. September 8, 2015 – AMC Technology ( http://www.amctechnology.com ), has announced it will be a sponsor at the Dreamforce 2015 conference held in San Francisco at the Moscone Center. AMC will be in the Cloud Expo in Moscone West, booth #N830, with demos and guidance on how to communication-enable Salesforce and Desk.com to increase agent efficiency and improve customer service. Booth visitors will have the opportunity to pick up AMC’s Dreamforce ’15 t-shirt and enter to win some great prizes. “Dreamforce is a quintessential experience for Salesforce partners and customers,” stated Aimee Stinson, Director of Strategic Alliances at AMC Technology. “We are pleased to once again be a sponsor and host a partner theater session where we will be showing organizations how to address unique requirements by using Agent Palette to extend our Salesforce adapter functionality. This year we are pleased to include Desk.com to the list of business applications for which we provide contact center integration. ”
Visit AMC at their booth, #W830, to view the latest Contact Canvas version and learn more about support for Omni channel, knowledge workers, outbound dialers. With 20 years of experience in contact center integration world-wide, AMC’s Contact Canvas solution is ideal for the enterprise class customer or small/medium business that is seeking an innovative solution to compete in the marketplace and map their customer journey.
About AMC Technology
AMC Technology, LLC, is a global industry leader in contact center and CRM integration with nearly 20 years of experience. AMC powers contact centers for customers around the globe through certified products and unparalleled expertise. AMC Contact CanvasTM product suite allows customers to integrate business applications and communications across the enterprise, from call center agents to knowledge workers and mobile staff. For more information, visit http://www.amctechnology.com or contact sales@amctechnology.com or +1 (804) 419-8600.
